definitions: [measure word for things with a handle]
to move (house, or large heavy objects)
to help, to do a favor
[measure word for floor, level of a building]
[structural particle used before a verb or adjective]
to exercise, to work out, to train a skill
to put, to place; to release
to review (as part of one's studies)
to catch cold, to have a cold; a cold
to close, to shut, to turn off
to care for, to be concerned about
(in the) past; to go over (to a place)
to be afraid; to be scared
to reply, to answer; the answer
to climb a mountain, to go hiking
to ride (by straddling, as when riding a horse or bike)
to go online, to use the internet
pair, [measure word for pairs of things]
to hurt, to be sore; to love dearly
for the purpose of, in order to
to bathe, to take a shower
to run into, to come across
at last; in the end; finally; eventually
